AVEVA

Leading the digitalisation of the industrial world

  • Leading independent industrial and engineering software company
    • Hardware agnostic business model maximises addressable market
    • Attract and retain the best talent
    • Performance benchmarked against global software peers
  • Focused on value creation for all of our customers and shareholders
    • Extremely positive customer reaction after OSIsoft close
    • End-to-endproduct portfolio supports customers' digitalisation journeys
    • Subscription delivers flexibility for customers and value for investors
  • Exciting structural growth opportunity
    • Mega trends are driving the uptake of industrial software
